title: Google | Software Engineer, University Graduate Dec 2023
content:
Education: MTech from Tier-1 College
Years of Experience: 3 (Non IT)
Company: Google
Title/Level: Software Engineer (L3)
Location: Bangalore (tentative)
Salary: INR 20.9L
Signing Bonus: INR 1.5L
Performance Bonus: INR 3.135L (15% of base pay)
Benefits: Standard Google benefits worth 1.87L (PF + Gratuity + Insurances)
Stock bonus: $32,500 over 4 years ( 38% in Y1~INR 10L)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Benefits): ~37L INR
Other details: On-Campus

Interview Experience - 
https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4771929/Google-on-campus-interview-experience-Dec-2023
